entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
